outputs.output_descr:
Objective 1: To improve the infrastructure and to support the urban upgrading and socio-economic revitalisation of  the main cities of the northern part of Cyprus (Nicosia, Famagusta, Kyrenia etc.) and the surrounding areas, including technical assistance for project planning and related studies, organisation of cultural events and other promotional activities.
Objective 2: To improve the infrastructure and to support the urban upgrading and socio-economic revitalisation of minor town/villages in the northern part of Cyprus including technical assistance for project planning, organisation of cultural events and other promotional activities.
Objective 3: To enable the opening of new crossing points.
outputs.output_title: Upgr. of Loc. & Urb. Infr. Ph2

project_descr: Upgrading of local and urban infrastructure - phase 2
